disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of thorax

symptoms.name: Dyspnea
symptoms.pattern: Shortness of breath, especially if the tumor is large

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.pattern: May be present if the tumor is compressing airways

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in some cases
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated if the tumor is compressing airways
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated or decreased depending on the tumor's location and size

imaging_findings.CT scan: May show a mass in the thorax
imaging_findings.MRI: May show the extent of the tumor and involvement of surrounding structures
imaging_findings.PET scan: May show metabolic activity of the tumor

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the thorax
supportive: Clinical symptoms suggestive of a thoracic mass
